header.title: Apparel Manufacturers
header.subtext: African factories searching for new buyers and suppliers

b2bblocks.title: Build a credible digital presence
b2bblocks.content: Design your unique digital profile and showcase your collections on our E-Showrooms. Build trust by displaying compliance, factory capabilities, lead times and MOQs.

b2bblocks.title: A marketing & sourcing platform focused on Africa
b2bblocks.content:
Join our network and be visible to buyers looking for reliable partners in Africa.

Find new  Buyers, Yarn, Fabric & Trims Suppliers, and Service Providers.

b2bblocks.title: Find new markets
b2bblocks.content:
Create business opportunities by promoting your company and advertising your offers on the Home Feed.

Search what you are looking for and contact new buyers or sellers.

supportblocks.title: Manual Matching
supportblocks.content:
Join our network of preferred Apparel Manufacturers whom we link with Buyers looking to source in Africa.

Take advantage of our supply chain services when working with new buyers to demonstrate trust through compliance and quality control.

Boost digital visibility with support & training from our Marketing & Sales team.

supportblocks.title: Country Representatives
supportblocks.content: Tap into our network of Country Representatives present in Buying and Producing countries to support you grow in the region.
